import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { BurgerMenu } from '../components/BurgerMenu' import { Footer } from '../components/Footer' import { NavBar } from '../components/NavBar' import useFetchGet from '../hooks/fetch/useFetchGet' import MyLoader from '../components/Loader' import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext' import rootstyle from '../styles/root.module.css' const Notifications = () => { const { user } = useAuth() const [Notifications, setNotification] = useState([]) const { Data, isLoading, failedToFetch } = useFetchGet({ url: 'http://localhost:4000/api/notifications', id: user.id, Effect: user, }) useEffect(() => { if (Data) { setNotification(Data) } }, [user]) if (isLoading) { return } return (
{Notifications.map(Notification => (
{Notification.id}
{Notification.match_id}
₴
₴
x
{formatDate(Notification.created_at)}
Status: {Notification.status}
))}
) } export default Notifications
